text: Sperryville is a census-designated place (CDP) in Rappahannock County, Virginia, United States. It is near the Thornton River. The population as of the 2010 Census was 342.Virginia Trend Report 2: State and Complete Places (Sub-state 2010 Census Data). Missouri Census Data Center. Accessed 2011-06-08. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in Virginia
title: Sperryville, Virginia
